name: part_006
file: tmp_【 #博衣こより2周年ライブ 】想い出をライブで届けるMemories & Future!! ＜ゲスト多数！感謝✨＞【3D LIVE】 [wg4-Un6zTiU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Hakui Koyori performs a emotional cover of 'Diamond Crevasse' in a space-themed 3D stage setup.

subtitles.original: もう二度と　触れられないなら
subtitles.english: If I can never touch you again,

subtitles.original: せめて最後に　もう一度抱きしめてほしかったよ
subtitles.english: At least for the last time, I wanted you to hold me once more.

subtitles.original: It's long long goodbye...
subtitles.english: It's long long goodbye...

subtitles.original: さよなら　さよなら　何度だって
subtitles.english: Goodbye, goodbye, no matter how many times.

subtitles.original: 自分に夢中に言い聞かせて
subtitles.english: I'll keep telling myself, absorbed in my own thoughts.

subtitles.original: 手を振るのは優しさだよね　今　強さが欲しい
subtitles.english: Waving goodbye is a form of kindness, right? Now, I want strength.

subtitles.original: あなたに出会い　星が輝いて　あたしは生まれて
subtitles.english: I met you, the stars began to shine, and I was born.

subtitles.original: 愛すればこそ　iで爆走
subtitles.english: Because I love you, I race through life with 'i'.

subtitles.original: 希望のない奇跡を待って　どうなるの
subtitles.english: What will happen if I wait for a miracle without hope?

subtitles.original: 涙に滲む　星の瞬きは　ゴォ...
subtitles.english: The twinkling stars, blurred by tears, are...

subtitles.original: 忘れないよ　あなたの温もりも　その優しさも
subtitles.english: I won't forget your warmth, or your kindness.

subtitles.original: すべて包んでくれた両手も
subtitles.english: Or both of your hands that wrapped around everything.

subtitles.original: Oh... It's long long goodbye...
subtitles.english: Oh... It's long long goodbye...

subtitles.original: さよなら　さよなら　愛しい人
subtitles.english: Goodbye, goodbye, my beloved.

subtitles.original: あなたがいたから　歩いてこれた
subtitles.english: Because you were there, I was able to walk this far.

subtitles.original: ひとりなんかじゃなかったよね　今　答えが欲しい
subtitles.english: I wasn't alone, was I? Now, I want an answer.

subtitles.original: 燃えるような流星捕まえて　灯をともして
subtitles.english: Catching a burning meteor, lighting a flame.

subtitles.original: 愛していたい　iさえ　果てて
subtitles.english: I want to keep loving, even if 'i' reaches its end.

subtitles.original: 冷えた体　ひとつで世界は　どうなるの
subtitles.english: With just one cold body, what will happen to the world?

subtitles.original: 張り続けけていた　虚勢が溶けてく
subtitles.english: The bravado I kept putting on is starting to melt away.

subtitles.original: Oh... どうしてなの　涙あふれて
subtitles.english: Oh... why am I overflowing with tears?

subtitles.original: 止められない...
subtitles.english: I can't stop it...

subtitles.original: あなたに出会い　星が輝いて　あたしは生まれて
subtitles.english: I met you, the stars began to shine, and I was born.

subtitles.original: 愛すればこそ　iで爆走
subtitles.english: Because I love you, I race through life with 'i'.

subtitles.original: 希望のない奇跡を待って　どうなるの
subtitles.english: What will happen if I wait for a miracle without hope?

subtitles.original: 涙に滲む　星の瞬きは...
subtitles.english: The twinkling stars, blurred by tears...

subtitles.original: 生まれ変わって　また巡り会うなら
subtitles.english: If we are reborn and meet again,

subtitles.original: その時もきっと　あたしを見つけ出して
subtitles.english: Then surely, find me again.

subtitles.original: もう二度と　離さないで捕まえてて
subtitles.english: Never let me go again, keep hold of me.

subtitles.original: ひとりじゃないと　囁いてほしい　プラネット
subtitles.english: I want you to whisper that I'm not alone, Planet.
